title: Mat Promet eShop
description: Built full-stack e-commerce solution with SSR for SEO optimization and automated email-based order tracking. Drove 40% sales increase and reduced order processing time.

title: Easy Testimonials
description: Developed customizable testimonial platform with intuitive styling interface. Built reusable component architecture for rapid feature deployment and streamlined social proof collection.

title: Build Beacon
description: Building structured alternative to social media for indie developers to document complete project journeys. Addresses visibility issues on crowded platforms like X by enabling transparent, long-form storytelling that cultivates engaged audiences beyond ephemeral posts.
